messages.name: agent 1
messages.message: Hey John! I'm good, thanks. How about you?

messages.name: John Doe
messages.message: Can't complain. Hey, do you happen to know what the minimum age is to open an account here?

messages.name: agent 1
messages.message: I think it's 18 years. At least that's what I was told when I opened mine.

messages.name: Jane Doe
messages.message: Hi John! How have you been?

messages.name: agent 2
messages.message: Hey Jane! I've been good, thank you. How about yourself?

messages.name: Jane Doe
messages.message: Not too bad. By the way, do you know what the minimum balance is to maintain an account here?

messages.name: agent 2
messages.message: I believe it's $10. That's what they mentioned when I signed up.

messages.name: Agent
